title: How to Make a Formica Cleaner

steps.headline: Mix the soap, vinegar and olive oil together.
Pour the mixture into the warm water.
Spray countertops, cupboards, etc., and sponge over.
Wipe down with either a damp cloth or kitchen towel.

text: Mix the soap, vinegar and olive oil together.  Pour the mixture into the warm water.  Mix well.  Pour into a spray bottle. Shake well. Spray countertops, cupboards, etc., and sponge over. Rinse off. Wipe down with either a damp cloth or kitchen towel.  Finished.
